name: Wells Fargo 2015 Campus Analytics Challenge
body:
# Introduction
description of the goals of this project and what we did to accomplish them
flow diagram

# What financial topics do consumers discuss on social media and what caused the consumers to post about this topic?
##Approach
describe approach to this question in more detail
##Bank A
post wordcloud, tf plot
identify 3 key terms
sentiment analysis of 3 key terms
wordcloud of "good"
analysis of results

##Bank C  
##Bank D

code for splitting df into banks, code for wc, tf plot, sa

# Are the topics and “substance” consistent across the industry or are they isolated to individual banks?
##Approach
describe approach to this question in more detail
##Industry
wordcloud, tf plot, sa
discuss common terms
discuss sentiment scores for each bank vs. industry

post wordcloud, tf plot
identify 3 key terms
sentiment analysis of 3 key terms
wordcloud of "good"
analysis of results

##Bank C
